Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance(n)

programme.title: Cold Creek Manor
programme.desc: Cooper Tilson (Dennis Quaid) and his wife Leah (Golden Globe winner Sharon Stone) are New Yorkers wanting to escape city life for the saner, safer countryside. They move their two children into a dilapidated old mansion filled with the possessions of the previous family. Turning it into their dream house becomes a living nightmare when the previous owner (Stephen Dorff) shows up, and a series of terrifying incidents leads them on a search for clues to the estate's dark and lurid past

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict. Stars Kristen Wiig and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: Based on the Jane Austen novel, five sisters in a British family are ruled by a mother determined to marry her daughters into money. Academy Award nominee Keira Knightley stars as Elizabeth Bennett, along with Donald Sutherland, Academy Award winner Judi Dench and Academy Award nominee Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Good Advice
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as a successful stockbroker who, after losing his fortune on a bad stock tip, decides to secretly write into his ex-girlfriend's less-than-successful advice column, setting of a romantic chain of events. Also stars Denise Richards and Rosanna Arquette

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: Based on the Jane Austen novel, five sisters in a British family are ruled by a mother determined to marry her daughters into money. Academy Award nominee Keira Knightley stars as Elizabeth Bennett, along with Donald Sutherland, Academy Award winner Judi Dench and Academy Award nominee Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: The Band's Visit
programme.desc: A band comprised of Egyptian Policemen head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town. This ultimately leads to revelations that cross cultural boundaries

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Blackway

programme.title: 45 Years

Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: A depression-era sports drama about the legendary racehorse, Seabiscuit, and the three men who saw him to victory. Together, the three work to help the famed horse to several symbolic victories that helped to inspire a downtrodden 1930s America. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his preteen son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, ten strangers are stranded at an isolated motel in the Nevada desert, only to learn each of them has a secret, and that their arrival at the motel has not been a matter of mere chance. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Jumpy thriller about an unhinged Gulf War vet (Michael Shannon) who infects an Oklahoma waitress (Ashley Judd) with his paranoid delusions involving invasive insects and clandestine military experiments. Directed by William Friedkin and written by Tracy Letts, who adapted his stage play. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Turning Point

programme.title: Marked for Death

programme.title: As Above, So Below

programme.title: The Omen

programme.title: Dead Calm

Based on Charles Williams' novel, which was also adapted by Orson Welles for an aborted movie in the 1960s titled “The Deep.” (cc)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: A kind of `Cosby' or `Father Knows Best' for the times, about a trucking-company executive, his wife and their three kids in suburban Connecticut. A steady performer for ABC, `Wife' ranges from issue-oriented to slapstick. It's very much the vision of star Damon Wayans (also a coexecutive producer), who based it in part on his own life, and frequently uses family members as actors, directors and screenwriters. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Twórcy programu jeżdżą po mieście i pytają o wszystko, o co chcieliby zapytać widzowie

programme.title: Impreska
programme.desc: Zestawienie tanecznych hitów, które idealnie sprawdzają się na imprezach. W czasie programu widzowie mogą wysyłać wiadomości SMS

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Albert
programme.desc: Of all the trees at Earth Mama's nursery, little Douglas fir tree Albert has the biggest ambition. He hopes to one day be the star of the show as the Christmas tree sitting at the heart of Empire City. As the festive season approaches, Albert set his mind to helping all the other plants at the nursery into the Christmas spirit. However, when a city-wide news bulletin announces the search for this year's tree, Albert spots a chance to live his dream, and sets out on a journey with help from his friends Maisie, a persistently positive palm tree, and Gene, a blisteringly honest weed. Festive animated adventure, with the voices of Bobby Moynihan, Sasheer Zamata and Judah Friedlander

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Flying Dutchman takes up residence at SpongeBob's house where he proceeds to scare, startle and surprise him around the clock(n)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. When everyone except Thera gets a detention for an awesomisation that goes wrong, she becomes upset when the team turns the session into an ultra cool club. Then, awesome drum major Noam - the only one capable of making the school's awful marching band cool but who hates being in the limelight - is disguised by the team in a giant two-man bandleader costume

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. When a frozen student from the 1980s is thawed and stanked, Randy and Howard must reunite him with his lost love before the school is destroyed. Then, Randy accidently causes the captain of the Wave Slayer team to get stanked, towel boy/waxers Randy and Howard must step up to save the big race

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy has to learn a valuable lesson about respect and humility after accidently breaking his sword. Then, a freaky new exchange student threatens to ruin Randy and Howard's friendship

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer loses his guitar-pick necklace and cannot see Billy any more. Billy is so desperate for attention he inadvertently convinces Hugh and Jane the house is haunted. Then, Spencer enters a Halloween competition to find the best haunted house. The winner gets to work with a famous special effects director and Lolo is determined to thwart Spencer

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer gets what he deserves when he cons Hugh into taking him on a camping trip so he can shoot a desert-themed horror movie

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: When Bad Dogs Go Big/The Bottyguard.
programme.desc: Double bill. Growler grows to the size of a T-rex after eating a Kat device, and proceeds to swallow everything in sight including Dennis and Coop. Then, a robot becomes protective of Coop

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat's surly teenage son Junior arrives in a space pod having run away from home. As Junior struts around, threatening to blow Kat's cover, Coop helps Kat send him back. Dad accidentally swaps some of Kat's weapons for other stuff, so Coop tries to get them back

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Gossip Boy/The Tale of the Golden Doctor's Note.
programme.desc: Double bill. Howard accidentally tells everyone he knows the identity of the ninja, and is promptly kidnapped by McFist. Then, Randy hunts for a mythical golden doctor's note

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: House of 1,000 Boogers/Attack of the Killer Potatoes.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy crashes Bash's party and discovers it is a plot to unmask the Ninja. Then, Randy learns his enemy's science project is meant to destroy the ninja

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Ozzy steals a nerd's birthday present so Boyster disguises himself to get it back. Then, on Halloween everyone is playing a video game featuring crabs, but Boyster has a phobia about them

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys create a giant version of a game that Candace holds the record for playing

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.desc: Part one of two. Hulk's best friend Rick Jones begins making a web-series to show the world Hulk is a hero, and Annihilus invades Earth

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: When Red Skull crashes to Earth, the Avengers learn there is a villain in their midst a thousand times more dangerous than the Cabal and end up looking for something called Arsenal

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The Guardians try to stop Ronan's plans to destroy Kree Supreme Intelligence

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.desc: A year after teenager Peter Parker first became Spider-Man, he is invited to join Shield by Nick Fury. He realises he may need to join if he is to fight the forces of evil

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Put That Putter Away/Does This Duckbill Make Me Look Fat.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys build their own miniature golf course. Plus, Candace and Perry accidentally swap bodies after testing a teleporter the boys have built

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace takes the DVD from the traffic camera and shows it to her mother as proof of the boys' misdeeds. Plus, the boys decide to create the biggest ever bowling ball

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: Scarlett, a Skylar lookalike from Caldera, visits and brings Skylar home with her

programme.title: Unlocking the Mech
programme.desc: Compilation of shorts featuring characters fighting robots and monsters, as well as showcasing new features of the Mech, and new gadgets like Mech-Links and X-Goggles

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.sub-title: A Night Witch You'll Always Remember.
programme.desc: When Bailey discovers that Clumsy Carl is going to ask her to an upcoming dance, she desperately searches for a different date and lands on Herman

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: A scientist accidentally locks himself inside a sophisticated anti-matter vault, and only thief-turned-chauffeur Parker has the skillset required to get the man out. With the voices of series veteran David Graham

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family goes on holiday, leaving Perry behind. When the platypus saves Carl from one of Doof's rays, it makes him disappear. Lenny Henry guest stars

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family searches for Perry after Doof's rays make him disappear. Lenny Henry guest stars

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: Part two of two. While at Caldera, Scarlett turns on Skylar, and it's up to the team to save her

programme.title: Walk the Prank

Major Clanger finds it very interesting and decides to take a sample to his workshop to analyse, but he's amazed to see that it has disappeared and has been replaced by water.
